C

CENTER_ALIGNMENT - Static variable in class view.CSSStyles
CSS style for center alignment.
checkWinner(GameState) - Static method in class controller.UIBoardActions
Helper method used after move is made on the board.
COMBOBOX_FONTSIZE - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The font size of the combo box.
COMBOBOX_HEIGHT - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The height of the combo box in all scenes.
COMBOBOX_WIDTH - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The width of the combo box in all scenes.
ComputerPlayer - Class in model
This class represents a computer player player in a Tic-Tac-Toe game and extends the UserPlayer class.
ComputerPlayer(char) - Constructor for class model.ComputerPlayer
Construct a computer player player by initializing its symbol and movesMade fields.
computerTurn() - Static method in class controller.UIBoardActions
Simulate the computer player's move on the Tic-Tac-Toe game.
controller - package controller
The controller package contains all the classes responsible for managing the interactions between the user, the model and the view of the Tic-Tac-Toe game.
CSSStyles - Class in view
This class defines various CSS styles that are used to set the appearance of user interface (UI) elements in the GUI.
CSSStyles() - Constructor for class view.CSSStyles
 
currentPlayer - Variable in class model.TicTacToeBoard
Player who currently has to make a move.
